trans-unit.source: Represents an interface that can be implemented by classes providing streams.
trans-unit.target: 表示可由類別提供資料流實作的介面。

trans-unit.source: When writing an outgoing message containing a streamed body to an XML writer, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> will use a sequence of calls similar to the following in its <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.OnWriteBodyContents%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter%29> implementation:
trans-unit.target: 將含有經過資料流處理之本文的傳出訊息寫入至 XML 寫入器時，<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> 將會在其 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.OnWriteBodyContents%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter%29> 實作中使用類似下面一連串的呼叫：

trans-unit.source: Write any necessary information preceding the stream (For example, the opening XML tag).
trans-unit.target: 在資料流前面寫入任何必要的資訊，例如，開頭 XML 標記。

trans-unit.source: Write the stream.
trans-unit.target: 寫入資料流。

trans-unit.source: Write any information following the stream (For example, the closing XML tag).
trans-unit.target: 在資料流後面寫入任何資訊，例如，結束 XML 標記。

trans-unit.source: This works well with encodings that are similar to the textual XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: 這很適合用在類似文字 XML 編碼方式的編碼。

trans-unit.source: However, there are some encodings that do not place XML infoset information (For example, tags for starting and ending XML elements) together with the data contained within elements.
trans-unit.target: 不過，有些編碼並不會將 XML InfoSet 資訊 (例如，XML 項目的開頭及結束標記) 與包含在項目內的資料放在一起。

trans-unit.source: For example, in the MTOM encoding, the message is split into multiple parts.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在 MTOM 編碼中，訊息會分割為多個部分。

trans-unit.source: One part contains the XML infoset, which may contain references to other parts for actual element contents.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個部分會包含 XML InfoSet，而這其中可能會包含實際項目內容之其他部分的參考。

trans-unit.source: Since the XML infoset will normally be small compared to the streamed contents, it makes sense to buffer the infoset, write it out, and then write the contents in a streamed way.
trans-unit.target: 由於 XML InfoSet 通常會比資料流處理後的內容還要小，因此合理的做法是先緩衝處理 InfoSet，再將它寫出，然後以資料流的處理方式寫入內容。

trans-unit.source: This means that by the time the closing element tag is written, we should not have written out the stream yet.
trans-unit.target: 這意味著，在寫入項目結束標記以前，我們應該還沒有寫出資料流。

trans-unit.source: For this purpose, the <xref:System.Xml.IStreamProvider> interface is used.
trans-unit.target: 為此，這時會使用 <xref:System.Xml.IStreamProvider> 介面。

trans-unit.source: The interface has a <xref:System.Xml.IStreamProvider.GetStream> method that returns the stream to be written.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面具有可以傳回要寫入之資料流的 <xref:System.Xml.IStreamProvider.GetStream> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The correct way to write out a streamed message body in <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.OnWriteBodyContents%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter%29> is as follows:
trans-unit.target: 寫出 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.OnWriteBodyContents%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter%29> 中已由資料流處理之訊息本文的正確方式如下所示：

trans-unit.source: Write any necessary information preceding the stream (For example, the opening XML tag)
trans-unit.target: 在資料流前面寫入任何必要的資訊，例如，開頭 XML 標記。

trans-unit.source: Call the `WriteValue` overload on the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter> that takes an <xref:System.Xml.IStreamProvider>, with an `IStreamProvider` implementation that returns the stream to be written.
trans-unit.target: 配合傳回要寫入之資料流的 `WriteValue` 實作，在接受 <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter> 的 <xref:System.Xml.IStreamProvider>上呼叫 `IStreamProvider` 多載。

trans-unit.source: Write any information following the stream (For example, the closing XML tag)
trans-unit.target: 在資料流後面寫入任何資訊，例如，結束 XML 標記。

trans-unit.source: With this approach, the XML writer has a choice of when to call <xref:System.Xml.IStreamProvider.GetStream> and write out the streamed data.
trans-unit.target: 透過這種方式，XML 寫入器就可以選擇呼叫 <xref:System.Xml.IStreamProvider.GetStream> 以及寫出經過資料流處理之資料的時機。

trans-unit.source: For example, the textual and binary XML writers will call it immediately and write out the streamed contents in between the start and end tags.
trans-unit.target: 例如，文字及二進位 XML 寫入器將立即呼叫此方法，並寫出開頭與結束標記之間的資料流處理內容。

trans-unit.source: The MTOM writer may decide to call <xref:System.Xml.IStreamProvider.GetStream> later, when it is ready to write the appropriate part of the message.
trans-unit.target: MTOM 寫入器則可能會決定於稍後準備好要寫入訊息的適當部分時，再呼叫 <xref:System.Xml.IStreamProvider.GetStream> 。

trans-unit.source: Gets a stream.
trans-unit.target: 取得資料流。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to return the stream to be written.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可以用來傳回要寫入的資料流。

trans-unit.source: The stream being released.
trans-unit.target: 正在釋放的資料流。

trans-unit.source: Releases a stream to output.
trans-unit.target: 釋放資料流到輸出。
